<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Set user role</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/v2/organizations/{organizationId}/users/{userId}/set-role"}></MethodEndpoint>



Sets user role in organization. Owner or Member.

## Request
